tool_description: Manages and schedules exclusivity windows across different distribution channels and territories, ensuring proper sequencing and avoiding overlaps.

exclusivity_type.description: Type of exclusivity: theatrical, streaming, broadcast, digital

window_duration_days.description: Duration of exclusivity window in days (1-3650)

priority_level.description: Priority level (1-10, higher number = higher priority)

error_messages: Invalid content ID: Content not found in database.
Invalid territory code: Use valid ISO country code.
Invalid exclusivity type: Use one of [theatrical, streaming, broadcast, digital].
Invalid window duration: Duration must be between 1 and 3650 days.
Invalid priority level: Priority must be between 1 and 10.
Overlapping exclusivity: Another exclusivity window conflicts with this period.
usage: Provide content_id, territory_code, exclusivity_type, window_start, and window_duration_days. Optionally set priority_level for conflict resolution.

window_id.description: Unique identifier for the exclusivity window

window_end_date.description: Calculated end date of exclusivity window

next_available_window.description: Next available window start date if scheduling failed

existing_windows.description: List of existing exclusivity windows for this content and territory
